entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
